name: Story 1
text: There were two Hooks going for a walk, they met Horsy who was going to the Beuty Salon. Conversation order: Hook > Horsy

name: Story 2
text: On the way to the Beuty Salon Horsy asked Forky for direcction, but Forky was trying to make a prank on him. Conversation order: Horsy > Forky > Candle > Hook

name: Story 3
text: Horsy came to the Beuty Salon, Blower was right behind him when he and glasess arrive to enter. Conversation order: Horsy > Hook > Glases > Blower
